trans-unit.source: Specifies constants that define which mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as constantes que definem qual botão do mouse foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by many classes, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada por muitas classes, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetCharFromPosition%2A> method to obtain a character from the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> given its control coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetCharFromPosition%2A> método para obter um caractere do conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> considerando suas coordenadas do controle.

trans-unit.source: The example code uses coordinates located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> object passed as a parameter to the event handler to determine the location in the control to obtain the character.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código usa coordenadas localizadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> objeto passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos para determinar o local no controle para obter o caractere.

trans-unit.source: The character is then displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> if it is not a space character.
trans-unit.target: O caractere é exibido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> se não for um caractere de espaço.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1` has been created and that the example code is connected to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> controle chamado `richTextBox1` foi criado e que o código de exemplo está conectado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar eventos de mouse diferente para desenhar o caminho do mouse em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.

trans-unit.source: A line segment is added to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> events that occur.
trans-unit.target: Um segmento de linha é adicionado para o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> eventos que ocorrem.

trans-unit.source: To update the graphics, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method is called for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar o gráfico, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> método é chamado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> em cada `MouseDown` e `MouseUp` eventos.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o caminho do gráfico é rolado para cima ou para baixo quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Additional mouse events, like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, are identified on screen as well.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de mouse adicionais, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, são identificadas na tela também.

trans-unit.source: Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: Também é exibido na tela é informações adicionais sobre o mouse do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> classe.

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: O botão esquerdo do mouse foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: The middle mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: O botão do meio do mouse foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: No mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum botão do mouse foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: The right mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: O botão direito do mouse foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: The first XButton was pressed.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro XButton foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: With Windows 2000, Microsoft is introducing support for the Microsoft IntelliMouse Explorer, which is a mouse with five buttons.
trans-unit.target: Com o Windows 2000, a Microsoft está introduzindo suporte para o Microsoft IntelliMouse Explorer, que é um mouse com cinco botões.

trans-unit.source: The two new mouse buttons (XBUTTON1 and XBUTTON2) provide backward/forward navigation.
trans-unit.target: Os dois novos botões de mouse (XBUTTON1 e XBUTTON2) fornecem navegação para trás/avanço.

trans-unit.source: The second XButton was pressed.
trans-unit.target: O segundo XButton foi pressionado.

trans-unit.source: With Windows 2000, Microsoft is introducing support for the Microsoft IntelliMouse Explorer, which is a mouse with five buttons.
trans-unit.target: Com o Windows 2000, a Microsoft está introduzindo suporte para o Microsoft IntelliMouse Explorer, que é um mouse com cinco botões.

trans-unit.source: The two new mouse buttons (XBUTTON1 and XBUTTON2) provide backward/forward navigation.
trans-unit.target: Os dois novos botões de mouse (XBUTTON1 e XBUTTON2) fornecem navegação para trás/avanço.
